text: MK Alam Chowdhury is a Jatiya Party (Ershad) politician and the former Member of Parliament of Nilphamari-3. ==Career== Chowdhury was elected to parliament from Nilphamari-3 as a Jatiya Party candidate in 1988. ==References== Category:Jatiya Party politicians Category:Living people Category:4th Jatiya Sangsad members Category:Year of birth missing (living people)
title: MK Alam Chowdhury
